local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(312.727, 577.369, 2604.029)) Plf:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.030, 0.997, 0.038, 0.057)) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
AddCinematicMessage( 100, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinLookStorage_cam01

trigger:Deactivate()
local humPl = GetEntityByName ("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
